db:abstract.db:para: The QMediaServiceDefaultDeviceInterface class interface identifies the default device used by a media service plug-in.
This struct was introduced in Qt 5.3.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A QMediaServiceProviderPlugin may implement this interface.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QMediaServiceDefaultDeviceInterface::~QMediaServiceDefaultDeviceInterface()
db:section.db:para: Destroys a media service default device interface.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QByteArray QMediaServiceDefaultDeviceInterface::defaultDevice(const QByteArray &service) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the default device for a service type.
